projects.name: Metal Records Store
projects.description: A demo store with some awesome metal records.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Made with the Pokemon API, you can search for Pokemons by name, ID or type to find images and information about them.

projects.name: To Do App
projects.description: A React App to make a list and save your to-dos.

projects.name: Rick & Morty
projects.description: React App made with the Rick & Morty API, you search the locations of the series to get information about 'em like name, type, characters; etc

projects.name: Trivia
projects.description: A trivia to test your knowledge about different topics.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Made with the Open Weather Map API, you can check the current weather in your location.
